long_description: The REI Sariska tunic complements your workout with incredibly soft fabric and an elegant print pattern. Polyester and spandex blend provides moisture-wicking comfort with a touch of stretch. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Internal shelf bra offers light support and features molded, removable cups. Mesh bra lining and plush elastic enhances comfort and moisture control. Tunic-length top increases overall coverage for a range of yoga poses. 26.5 in. center back length. The REI Sariska Tunic offers an active fit that moves effortlessly with the body and won't bind or twist. Please note: the REI Sariska tunic fits small; for best comfort, order up one size.
short_description: The REI Sariska tunic complements your workout with incredibly soft fabric and an elegant print pattern.
